values:
Is it wrong that when she posts a bulletin with a picture saying I just don't feel beautiful lately....that all I want to do is reply with, "You're still one of the most beautiful people I know"
But I can't. Not anymore.

Finals are over wednesday, I can't wait. Then I have a month that I don't need to worry about school....or anything. Oh man. I need a break.
And to talk to you again. I really need your friendship. You have no idea. Ugh.

I'm sorry I've been so disrespectful about your decision. I guess I can't ever fix anything this time.  There's nothing left to fix.  I need to admit that to myself.  We're too far apart.  Unless you have something else to say to me, I guess I'll never be able to be your friend again now. I had always had some lingering hope, but no matter your reasons....no matter how little sense they make to me.....you have made them.  And it's all my fault. Every part of it.  I'm stupid and....I just didn't get the point of what I as trying to do....or how to do it at them time. But I can't undo anything, so it doesn't matter now. 
To bad I'll never be able to tell you any of this.

Oh, and I realized that I don't miss her specifically.  I miss what we had....and the only person I know I might even come close to being able to create something similar with is taken.  "Well, he's my now.  Not anything more.  You'll be around for a while"
I don't think she has any ideas how much those words stung.  I can't wait for anyone else again. It ended up hurting to much last time.  I just need someone I can replace what we had with. I just can't seem to find it anywhere.
Ugh. :/.

And to add to my last post, am I the only one apalled by how extremely disrespectful people have been towards Obama?  My goodness.  He's your president elect.  Stand under him and be proud.  Even if you don't believe in his policies, like me, DO NOT disrespect him like the democrats did to bush.  His office commands respect, no matter who is occupying it.  I don't care what you think he'll do to our country; respect him.  I personally think we'll be worse off after his presidency [but I pray that he will prove everything I've read about him and come to conclusions about wrong] but I plan to fully respect him.  I think Obama, if he really stands for non partisanship like he claims, then he could be good.  I just don't see his bi partisan side...since he's never shown it to anyone.  but hey, it could be there.
But please, respect the office.

When you're dreaming with a broken heart
The waking up is the hardest part

You roll out of bed and down on your knees
and for a moment you can hardly breathe
Wondering was she really here
Is she standing in my room?

No, she's not
cause she's gone, gone, gone, gone, gone.

When you're dreaming with a broken heart
The giving up is the hardest part

She takes you in with her crying eyes
then all at once you have to say goodbye
wondering could you stay my love
will you wake up by my side?

No, she can't
cause she's gone, gone, gone, gone, gone.

Do I have to fall asleep with roses in my hand?
Do I have to fall asleep with roses in my hand?
Do I have to fall asleep with roses in my hand?
Do I have to fall asleep with roses in my, roses in my hands?
Would you get them if I did?

No, you won't
Cause you're gone, gone, gone, gone, gone.

When you're dreaming with a broken heart
the waking up is the hardest part.

Ugh. Fuck. I haven't been one to swear a lot for a long time, but honestly....FUCK.
This just doesn't seem to work.   I don't know what my problem is.  Why can't I be like every other guy I know and just move on in a day.  Or just start relationships with girls that you know won't be serious.  Or do any of the normal relationship stuff.  Why do I have to be different?  Why do I need to be an idealist when it comes to relationships and love?  Why do I feel the need to follow my morals and values? Why can't I just not have any like everyone else in the world?  Why does God keep telling me that I'm gonna do something great when I can't see me having any effect on anyone? Why are the prospects of life....and the realities that it's coming....so scary to me?  I wish I had everything planned out.  I mean like, college for piano performance and composition, and making music for movies and video games while being a concert pianist for the rest of my life.  Oh how I wish I could.  But I'm starting to think that I've got something else to do with my life.  Music college still seems like a good idea....but maybe then something else.  I don't know.  Maybe a masters in political science?  Or business? I'd love those.  I wouldn't mind running businesses or being in politics either.  A politician would be pretty sweet.  I think after Obama however, I might be to much of a conservative for everyone else.   maybe no one will be able to undo the damage I think Obama will do.  Yay for becoming like a Western European country!
Oh how I don't want that. After these next eight years [and trust me, it will be eight] we're gonna need a massive reformist.  More than Regan, more than anyone else.  I just don't think the public would take getting a smaller check from the treasury after Obama gives them a huge one.  Ugh.
How the hell did I get to politics in this rant?
Whatever.  I need to pray a lot.  Nothing in my life makes sense right now.  I wish I could just find someone tomorrow to replace the whole that you left in me....but I know that's not gonna happen.  I've tried everything I know how to do to fix it, but nothing's working.

I really need to trust God right now.

If I'm so over this during the day,
why the hell does it hurt so bad at night?
I wish I knew what I knew now and was the person I am today 7 months ago.  Or 2 months ago. But I guess I can't effect anything now. I've screwed everything up beyond repair.  Or so it seems to me.

It's incredible how much I can miss what I used to have. Or the lengths I'll go trying to replace it.....but I'm starting to realize it can't be replaced. I miss the closeness, the friendship....all of that. And I certainly can't seem to find anything that's the same anywhere else. Now, anyone reading this, don't get this confused with an, "I want her back" (in a romantic sense) post. This is not that post, nor is it how I feel anymore.


"It's a shame that it had to be this way
It's not enough to say I'm sorry
It's not enough to say I'm sorry

Maybe I'm to blame
Or maybe were the same
But either way I can’t breathe
Either way I can’t breathe

All I had to say is goodbye
Were better off this way
Were better off this way

I'm alive but I’m losing all my drive
Cause everything we've been through
And everything about you
Seemed to be a lie
A guiltless twisted lie
It made me learn to hate you
Or hate myself for letting it pass by

All I had to say is goodbye
Were better off this way
Were better off this way
All I had to say is goodbye
Were better off this way
Were better off this way

And every, everything isn't only
What it seemed so hold these
Words that you never told me
Its time to say goodbye
Its time to say goodbye
Its time to say goodbye
Goodbye

Bye

Take my hand away
Spell it out
Tell me I was wrong
Tell me I was wrong"

"I never wanted anything the way that I wanted you
But my words didn't seem to matter
My words don't seem to matter
And you look at me and I can see
The lies you're running too
But my words don't seem to matter
I'd rather have you tested and true

Now you've had your chance
So lets try my way,
To show you what you're missing, turn around
And feel the winds of change upon your face again
The warm breath of your closest friend
I"m waiting, I'm waiting

Are we fading?

Im scared well never make it right"

I think I'm finally ready to listen.
It's taken a lot of pounding to finally get me here though...
Losing a best friend.  One of my other best friends moving away.  My grandpa dying. Being overloaded on school. Seeing that I have fewer people I can really trust around me. It's been a busy summer.

It's amazing how much we try to fight what we know is what's supposed to happen. The way things are "meant to be"
I went to sleep fighting God every day this week. Really every day these last few months. But I guess I'm done with that now I think.

I just hate that I never gave myself a chance for a proper goodbye.

It's time for healing time to move on
 It's time to fix what's been broken too long
 Time make right what has been wrong
 It's time to find my way to where I belong
 There's a wave that's crashing over me
 All I can do is surrender
 
 Whatever you're doing inside of me
 It feels like chaos somehow there's peace
 It's hard to surrender to what I can't see
 but I'm giving in to something heavenly
 
 Time for a milestone
 Time to begin again
 Revaluate who I really am
 Am I doing everything to follow your will
 or just climbing aimlessly over these hills
 So show me what it is you want from me
 I give everything I surrender...
 
 Time to face up
 Clean this old house
 Time to breathe in and let everything out
 That I've wanted to say for so many years
 Time to to release all my held back tears
 
 Whatever you're doing inside of me
 It feels like chaos but I believe
 You're up to something bigger than me
 Larger than life something heavenly
 
 Whatever you're doing inside of me
 It feels like chaos but now I can see
 This something bigger than me
 Larger than life something heavenly
 Something heavenly
 
 It's time to face up
 Clean this old house
 Time breathe in and let everything out

I need help.

The two people I need seem so distant right now.
:/. this is terrible.


I love God. I can't wait to see him working in me.

I don't know what I'm supposed to do.
I hate not knowing things.
.......

"Let it all out get it all out
Rip it out, remove it
Don't be alarmed, when the wound begins to bleed

'Cause we're so scared to find out what this life's all about
So scared we're gonna lose it
And knowing all along
That's exactly what we need

And today I'll trust you with the confidence
of a man who's never known defeat
But tomorrow, upon hearing what I did
I will stare at you in disbelief
Oh inconsistent me, crying out for consistency"

I can't believe this. A week later, it's finally all hit.
No.
This can't have actually happened. No.
But wait. It did. :/.
1 week down....the rest of my life to go. I'm so excited.
:/.

"Reach out to me
Make my heart brand new
Every beat will be for you, for you

And I know you know
You touched my life
When you touched my heavy heart
and made it light"

God....I need you right now.

So. Peru is pretty sweet. :].
Daniel should be here though....it'd be more entertaining. but. oh well.

I miss a couple people in the states though....like...alot. but. I guess I can deal. :].

I love God quite a bit....he's already shown me some crazy stuff this trip. Not like the last one, but still really cool.
:].

Hmmmm.
I absolutely LOVE finding out that a couple of my good friends are assholes.
:].

Good day to you.

Last night was by far my favorite night of the summer so far. Driving around for a couple hours deciding who we should tp. Finally deciding on Cortnie, and then getting into a car chase with her brothers. How fun. Although I discovered I can handle my car quite well, :P.
And. This came out the better for our relationship. I think. And, if that stings when I see you quote was about me, you have no idea how fast my heart was beating when I saw you standing outside your house. That was intense. But I had to forget it right then since I had to get away from your brothers. haha.   And, yeah, it has been that long. crazy. :/.
:]. Beautiful.

I know this is for our good, I've come to realize that.
I just thought that maybe we could be friends.
or talk.
or something.
But I guess that's entirely out of the question huh?

have you ever had that feeling that you want to hit someone really, really hard?
Yeah. This is fun. 
Why am I like this? Why do I have to be me all the time?

Take advantage of these times, you said.
You let me down.
It hasn't been the first time.
As I'm falling in the pit of fire my mind's made up.
I'm never coming back here.
How long would it take me to walk across the United States all alone.
The West coast has been traumatized.
I think I'm the only one still alive.
Is it just a coincidence to see you by yourself with no direction.
Now it's time to move on.
Don't you know that things aren't getting better.
Don't try and stop me.
Because I'm falling fast into this pit of fire which surrounds us all.
In a blanket of fear that I've been wrapped in for years.
You can't stop me.
When the world caves in what are you going to do for me.
-Jimmy Eat World.

'night time. how awesome.
I didn't get home for till 12:30. I got to spend a good few hours watching a happy couple being all happy.
for 99% I didn't care, but there were a few times when....everything hit me. over. and over.
It's not jealousy, it's.....I dunno. It's hard to explain. maybe you get it.
I wish I knew what I should do, because this obviously isn't working for me.
I wish there was a way to talk you out of this. It isn't going to help me like you think it is.  If you're gonna do this, know it's for yourself, NOT for me. All it'll do is make me always think about what we could've been. If you want this, do it. If your reason is for me, don't.
I don't want this.
"thinking how I had you once.
No, I can't forget that.
Sometimes I wish I could loose you again."'

"I know what you wanna say
I know but I can't help feeling differently
I loved you and I shoulda said it but tell me just what has it ever meant
I can't help it baby this is who I am
I'm sorry but I can't just go turn off how i feel"

"If everything I meant to you,
You can lick and seal then fold in two
Then I've been so blind."

You close your eyes and kiss your hand then you blow it.
But it isn't meant for me, and I notice
If the choice was ours alone,
Then why'd we both choose letting go?
Does it end like this?

Time never had a chance to heal your heart
Just a number always counting down to a new start
If you always knew the truth
Then the world would spin around you
Are you dizzy yet?

Respectfully, so honestly I'm calling out
Do you hear the conversation we talk about?
Back away to the safety of a quiet house
If there's half a chance in this moment
When your eyes meet mine, we show it off.

All talk and not a lot to think, we were living dreams
And she never crept close to our naked feet
If there's something left to lose,
Then don't let me wear out my shoes
I'm still walking.

I tried, but it rang and rang, I called all night
On a payphone, remember those from another life?
If everything I meant to you,
You can lick and seal then fold in two
Then I've been so blind.

Oh, oh take it all back, take the first, the last and only.
Oh, oh take it all back, take it all back,
Everything you showed me.
Oh, oh this must be how it feels when the feeling goes

I told you as I hovered, I never felt this way
You said I have the shot that stops my clock
Baby it's OK
You said you'd never have regrets
Jesus, is there someone yet
Who got their wish; did you get yours, babe?

I like how nothing can really effect me at this point.
I can't drive for the rest of the week now.
My mom might try to take my car back.
I probably can't have sleepovers for a good portion of the summer now.
And yet one things hit me harder.
Which really is way less important.
I'm awesome at this.



I'm starting to get the hints God.

Oh man this weekend/beginning of the week's been beautiful.
To bad that's RIDICULOUSLY sarcastic.
Lots of thinking, drama, random stuff, and now I can't spend the night or have friends over just because of friday night.
UGH
I was REALLY wanting to talk to Daniel tonight about everything.

Today's mostly sucked. Except shoguns. mmm.
And being done with school
To bad I can't do anything now, for who knows how long.
This is the worst I've felt in a really, really long time.

You know, I'm kind of starting to enjoy all these hard times in my life, and all the times when my obvious sin is thrown back in my face.
They've both happened a good bit lately. And I'm starting to love them, for the growth I've gained from them.
God's wonderful. To bad I slap him right in the face so often.....
I need to get better at that. :/.

I really don't like being so torn between pasts, futures, old and new friends.
I miss you. SO much. I don't think you can even understand it really.
But I don't know what to do. Living with that is gonna keep me from alot of people that could be good.
But if the end justifies all this, then it'd be worth it..........But at this point it probably won't........:////.
why don't I just fucking give up? It would make sense.......UGH.
I really don't know. I probably don't even have a chance with this other person.
And she'd be gone in 3 months. But being alone is starting to get to me..............:/.
And if forced to choose....well it wouldn't be a choice.
Which means that it's not worth it.
Great. I hate having a mind that over thinks everything and does the "logical" thing.
Tonight's fun. But that's sarcastic.

"So forgive me
Cause I don't know what to do
When you look at me
There can be no hesitation
There cannot be a close second to you"

I can't do better than you. And I know that.
But I guess I need to. Or just stop all together.
Oye. I dunno what's wrong tonight. I hate these random feelings just rushing in.



I wish I could live life at the piano. or in a band. or SOMETHING. Everything makes sense in music....it's so much easier.



Note: None of this is meant to make you feel bad if it does. This is all problems with me....really nothing you can help much with. unless you just wanna talk.

So I got a car today,
unexpected, but really awesome.
And my dad spent like, twice as much as he originally said he would, which is pretty sweet.
I love my car.
It's a 2007 Saturn Ion, dark blue. :].
and it's a stick, so I'm learning! :D.
I drove it a bit today, soo fun. After tomorrow I'll have the stick down.

"There's plenty of time left tonight
 I promised I'd have you home before daylight
 We do the best we can in a small town
 Act like big city kids when the sun goes down
 
 If it's not too late for coffee
 I'll be at your place in ten
 We'll hit that all night diner
 And then we'll see
 
 There's so many things I have to say
 I'll stay up all night to hear about your day
 We do the best we can in a small town
 Act like kids in love when the sun goes down"

i love this song so much.

man, alot has changed for me in the last week. mostly my mindset. I'm finally getting a couple problems under control, and it feels so good to know I'm able to beat this.  :].
Oh and I really hope we keep up the talking, and that you meant what you said about seeing eachother soon. Just tell me when you're open.

And Daniel is a douchebag....:].

today was pretty much perfect. Andrew, an awesome new idea for bible study, becca, daniel, iron man, and amazing new Information that just makes everything better. Ah man today was so good. This weekend was absolutely perfect, really, except that I lost my wallet.........CRAP. :/.
Thanks God, I needed this weekend, it's been amazing.

I feel like this week is gonna be really eventful, that it might just make or break a lot of things. We'll see.

Ugh, I dunno what's up today. I feel so alone right now.
I can't even tell you really why.
Maybe because I hate when friends can't tell me things, but allude to it.
Maybe because I can't ask anyone about it.
Maybe because my closest friends have seemed so distant lately.
Maybe because I can't seem to get back into my Bible reading and prayer life. That's probably the most likely.
I dunno how it stopped, but it did. I've felt so dead recently. I hate it.

I wanna go back.
Before Italy everything seemed awesome.
Then Italy seemed to just cut everything off spiritually, and I haven't been able to get back into it. Maybe this weekend with Andrew will help. who knows.
I was over this, I was done, it was SO easy then...what happened?

Hope happened I guess. Sometimes hope in something, or someone can be the hardest thing for you.
Especially when it continually gets brought up and down, never being able to stay at either end.

I wanna hear what you have to say about me
Hear if you're gonna live without me
I wanna hear what you want
I remember february
And I wanna hear what you have to say about me
Hear if you're gonna live without me
I wanna hear what you want
What the hell do you want?

It's weird how as time goes on, a song's meaning to you can change so much.
There are a couple that...at one point I turned to them whenever I needed to be happy, get somekind of lift, and they'd work.
It seems all those songs, now, have reversed. I hear it and get sick to my stomach. I hate the thoughts, the memories, the feelings they bring back.
I don't know what's wrong with me tonight, but I can't think of anything else.

I've decided the book of James is amazing,and everyone should read it. It's deep man.

Oh, and go see Ben Stein's movie, Expelled, it's good.

Oh and I really wanna mend a few relationships back to where they were.

and I think I should update this more than once a month

Rome is freaking awesome. It's the first time in quite while since I've had that feeling of wonder, but I definitely have it now.
This trip's been beautiful. I love Rome. I love Pompei. I love smart cars, :D. I love alot of things. 

God's really hit me here on a number of occasions. The biggest one being when I walked into a church where Peter and Paul had been kept as prisoners before they were martyred. It was so awesome. There's so much history here, the Ancient Romans were incredible, the artists during the 1500-1600s are incredible. Everything here is beautiful. And the Gelato is delicious, :D. Ha. 

I can't wait to get home though, to see all my friends and such. Eleven days after I get back I can get my drivers license. So good. :].

Finally, I get to get away. Leave the country. Be somewhere I've never been before.
This is gonna be so awesome. I can't wait.
Italy here I come.





P.S. Maybe when I get home we can try being friends again?

"The important thing is this: to be able at any moment to sacrifice what we are for what we could become."
-Charles Du Bos

Well. I'm finally ready for this.
I've become someone who can handle this.
It's amazing how much change can happen in just a week,
how much someone can grow and alter their plans for the future in such a short time.
It really is incredible to think about.

I'm finally ready to be just your friend.
I didn't think I was gonna be here for awhile, but I'm ready to do that now.
So, if/when you're ready, wanna go back to being just friends?

I guess I shouldn't say go back, as, well I've never fully thought of you as just a friend,
but, are you ready to start? 
I don't want to lose the only girl I can trust with everything.
But if you don't want to or aren't ready, I respect that.

I'm still in awe of how much my mindset has changed over the last two days. 
It really is incredible.

Opening night.
I'm glad that my character needs to use alot of feelings for a couple scenes,
or else this would be much harder.
I hate being the guy that actually feels somedays.

This keeps re-hitting me, daily.
Seeing me without you, never again being able to think of you the same.
It doesn't make sense. It doesn't work in my head.
I wish I could just make the world better. I want to.
I want to fix everything. I feel like I should be able to.
Some things just aren't meant to be fixed.
What I am to you is not what you need.

"I remember it well
The first time that I saw
Your head around the door
'Cause mine stopped working"

I hate that I'm becoming nothing more than your last ones.
That's the very last thing I ever wanted.
i always wanted to be more to you. But I know I can't be now.

I need to stop avoiding dealing with this.
I'll never get over this that way. But,
I can't yet.

I wish I was a better man than I am.
But I'm not. So this is gonna take time.
But I sure pray that it's less time not more.

"there's always time
On my mind
So pass me by, I'll be fine
Just give me time"


"You know when you've found it,
There's something I've learned
'Cause you feel it when they take it away"

Today was finally a good one. Finally.
Everything is looking up again.
I know I'm not big enough to handle all of this at once,
but I can become someone who is big enough to handle it.
And that's what I've working on. Right now.

I'm still very sorry for all of this. I wish there were another way. :/.
Some dreams have to stay just that, dreams.
We'll both find new dreams though. And they'll be even better.
I'm excited for our futures though. To see what you're gonna do with your life.
To see what I'm gonna do with mine. It's gonna be fun. :].


"I see you dreaming by the ocean window
I hear you breathing like the waves upon the shore
The tide is turning on your time of sorrow
You will never be so lonesome any more

The breezes whisper as the curtain dances
Your dreams are deeper than the mystery of the sea
The sun itself is in the room beside you
With a message of how good your life can be

I know that a heart can just get buried
Stone by stone, crushing hope until it dies
Far away, but the message somehow carries
Beloved, it is time for you to rise. Time for you to RISE UP...

With a sudden sense of wonder | Though the promise goes unspoken
As the joy comes to your eyes | When the joy comes to your eyes
From the burden you've been under | For your soul was never broken

Beloved, it is time for you to rise, time for you to rise.

There's nothing wrong with taking time for sleeping
Your eyes are weary with the things that you have seen
A deeper promise your soul is keeping
Right in time for this appointment in your dream

Angels whisper so as not to wake you
There's nothing else in this whole world for you to do
But follow on to where your dream may take you
To see your footsteps from an eagle's point of view"

Very very very mutual. Don't worry about that at all.
I've never said anything bad about you, ever really.
:].

I think that that's the only option right now,
If I have to be just friends with you....then I need a complete mind set change. I've never, ever thought of you like that.
And starting something after two years of not doing it can be hard.
But, we can do it.
Keeping your friendship means enough to me that I'm willing to, agreed?





I like how we pseudo talk over this now....
hahaha.

I really, really wish that we could keep the exact same friendship we have....had. whatever.
but I check my phone constantly still.
And yeah, I don't want to just make anything worse, so I don't want to start it. :/.
Not to mention that I can't think of anything to talk about.
I can't think of where to go now.

I think that's what I'll have to do.
Start everything over again. With everything.

PS
I feel weird not talking.
But I guess it's how things will have to be?

Oh my gosh.
Why??
I honestly didn't think my week could get worse....
and now this.
I'm currently not allowed to go anywhere, or do anything, with anyone, for an indefinite period of time.
Why? Because my friend and I decided that instead of staying up late, we'd wake up early, so we were up till around 1, and then woke up at 5:30......
My mom decided randomly that she didn't like that and how we were being deceitful, which I still don't get as we weren't breaking or bending any rules. So, now I can't do anything. So all I have is time now.
To much time. I guess I finally have time to think everything over.
Oye.

Which now that I've had time....
it's finally hit. full.
Wow.

I really can't believe everything that's happened this week. I don't want to.

I might finally be ready to start letting go.....it'll kill me if I don't.
I just need to figure out where to start. Dismantling this will take awhile.

"we're so scared to find out what this life's all about
So scared we're gonna lose it
And knowing all along
That's exactly what we need"

"And you said 'I know that this will hurt
but if I don't break your heart, then things will just get worse.
If the burden seems too much to bear,
remember, the end will justify the pain it took to get us there.'"

"I really feel
That I'm losing my best friend
I can't believe
This could be the end."

"As clear as it seems, oh I still can't believe
But now we just float along"

"I have felt for sure last night
That once we said goodbye
No one else will know these lonely dreams
No one else will know that part of me
Im still driving away
And I'm sorry every day
I wont always love these selfish things
I wont always live
not stopping

It was my turn to decide
I knew this was our time
No one else will have me like you do
No one else will have me, only you"

"I wont always love what I'll never have"

Some musicians know how to capture my feelings better than I do myself.

I'm so speechless right now.
 But I feel like I'd be able to write pages upon pages.
 I still can't get my head fully around what's happened, whenever I try, I stop myself from going there, because I don't want to.
 This actually scares me alot, because I don't know how anything will turn out.
 If you had asked me a week ago where I'd be in five years, I'd have an answer, but today, I have no idea.
 
 The fact that we've put so much of ourselves, our time, our effort into this, and now...what's all that done?
 Shown us that we can never work because neither of us want to change who we are.
 I've always liked planning for the future, but it's becoming more and more apparent to me that whenever I do, things don't work, and I'm always let down by myself for making these plans.
 
 It scares me to think that God could make a girl so perfect, but still have us be incompatible to be together,
because, what about the next girl? Sure, it's gonna be a very long time, but what if I get to the same place I did this time...only to find the same issues?
 I don't even know how easy it'll be to open up to someone else like I did with you.  I trust you with everything about me, and I like to think you trust me, and I don't get to that point with most people.
 
 And the last thing I want is to be thought of as the same as the last guy.  I think you mean more to me than you have to any other guy, and....I really wish I could change something about us.
We're practically perfect in every way. But I guess that's where the problem is, practically.  But I hate thinking that a 99% still can't work. Why can 1% be so big?  Maybe one of us will change someday, maybe.  
 
 All I know is I have to have faith that whatever happens is for the best for us both, and will give us both the best opportunity to grow with eachother,and with everyone else.
If things are meant to be they will happen. I can only hope that one day our paths to love will meet again,
and something will be different, and we can go with eachother from then on

have  you ever seen a picture, and had so many feelings rush in?
Has there ever been a moment where everything seems to click,
and you realize some things in your life are unchangeable, despite your best efforts to change them?
Has there ever been a time when all you want is for things to go back how they were, before everything?
That you could change one little thing you did, and hope you'd be happier now?
But you know, if you did it, your plans for the future would be worse off?
ugh.
I need some sort of change, but I don't know what.
I don't know who I am anymore, often times I'm disgusted by myself,
things I do/have done, people I've hurt, lately I've been getting very self conscious to.
I never used to be like that.
What happened?
Hm.
I need sleep.

Wow, last night, after I got home from Spiderman, [freaking spectacular by the way], I was laying in bed...falling asleep...
and something hit me.
Everything I had been praying about lately, for the last month or so...
just, clicked.
And then, just to see, I put on my iPod and listened to a playlist I have of "thoughtful" [aka sad] music, 
and none of it effected me at all anymore.

I realized the American dream love,
has nothing to do with real love.
What most people think of as love...
the butterflies, the funny feelings, and whatnot, really....isn't love.
I don't think words can even express it.
There is not a way to truly describe it.

Seriously though, last night,
everything just felt as though it were lifted off my shoulders,
I feel so light now.
Praise God?
Um, yea.
:].
